overview: Living it up in the big city with dreams of making it in the hip-hop world, attractive 20-year-old African-Americans Aaron, Daekwon, Amber and Lovely rely on their looks and talent to achieve their professional goals. But will their collective penchant for lust -- and a lack of sexual inhibition -- get in the way? Lunic Adisson, Phil Adkins, Shydel James and Arlene Chico-Lugo star in this feel-good comedy from first-time filmmaker Glenn Gipson.
title: Rap Quest
